name: Mushroom Chicken in Sour Cream Sauce
author: Stephen Wallace
summary: Chicken breasts seasoned with paprika, lemon pepper, and garlic powder are slow cooked with white wine, sour cream, mushrooms, and cream of mushroom soup in this easy-to-prepare recipe that cooks while you go about your day.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
directions: Mix the salt, pepper, paprika, lemon pepper, and garlic powder together in a bowl; rub evenly onto all sides of the chicken breasts
Place the seasoned chicken into the bottom of a slow cooker
Add the cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, white wine, and mushrooms to the slow cooker
Secure the cover onto the slow cooker and cook on Low for 8 hours
